top_comments.comment: Why isn't Bannon indicted yet? Are you people too afraid, just don't care or you have too much money. This is all a bunch of hogwash I'm beginning to think that's total Washington DC inflation you childish little kids make me sick

comments_since_last_sample.body:
11 days now and we're still waiting.
I think the American people should start sending Garland alarm clocks, just to make sure he's still awake when he's (allegedly) at work.
It's beyond obvious by now that Garland is too much of a wimp to do anything.  Bannon is shitting in his face.
You’re fired up. Voicing exactly what we all feel.
